Overview




Physical and Mental Health













This site requires Javascript in order to view all its content.
Please enable Javascript in order to access all the functionality of this web site. Here are the instructions how to enable JavaScript in your web browser.

Supporting Your Well-Being
Get help with everyday challenges. Also, learn about how to take time off to recharge or take a longer leave to care for yourself or a family member. Get help caring for your kids and elderly parents, boosting your mental health, and more. Employee Assistance Program
It can often be helpful just having someone to talk to. Confidential help is a phone call away with Guidance Resources. LEARN ABOUT EAP



























Time Off and Holidays
We work hard at NVIDIA, but everyone needs to take time off now and again.
Because everyone's needs are different, our personal time-off (PTO) benefits are flexible. Employees decide when they want time off and work it out with their manager.

Learn More About Taking Time Off























Physical and Mental Health











 





Physical Well-Being
Staying active is an important part of practicing good health. NVIDIA provides you and your loved ones with resources to keep it moving. EXPLORE WELL-BEING PERKS








 





Home and Family Care
Finding the right care provider isn’t always easy. NVIDIA partners with Care.com to connect you with caregivers for your child, elder, or pet. LEARN ABOUT SUPPORT FOR CAREGIVERS








 





Mental Health
Keeping yourself healthy is more than a physical pursuit. It’s also a mental one.

At NVIDIA, you have many resources available to help you manage stress, anxiety, depression, loss, confusion, frustration, or any other challenge. READ ABOUT MENTAL HEALTH BENEFITS




















 





Leave of Absence
NVIDIA offers multiple leave programs when you need to take time off from work for reasons other than vacation.
